name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SimpleURL - Search Bookmarks, URL Shortner & Link shortner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search bookmarks, free URL shortner and link shortner. It allows easy access to links and information to boost team productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimpleURL is an all-in-one URL manager designed to 
- Allows users to create, manage, and share  Bookmarks & Short URLs. 
- Search your bookmarked URLs, Short URLs by description, title etc

SimpleURL makes it easy to find and organize URLs, enhance collaboration within organizations, and ensure secure access to your digital resources.

Read more: https://medium.com/@ronakkhunt/unlocking-the-power-of-private-short-urls-to-boost-your-productivity-054e3ecdfe16

Exclusive Domain: Ensure privacy and control over your shared links with our closed system. Short URLs generated within your company are restricted for internal use only, adding an extra layer of security.

Effortless URL Creation: Streamline the process of creating short URLs directly within Slack, enhancing the speed and convenience of sharing links in your team's communication channels.

Slack Integration: Integrate our application seamlessly into your Slack workspace, providing a unified and efficient environment for URL management within your company.

User-Focused Design: Designed with the end user in mind, our solution boasts an intuitive interface for both Slack and Chrome, ensuring a user-friendly experience without compromising functionality.

NOTE: This extension only uses the storage permission to remember your settings.
